name: Trio the Punch
summary:
The action game "Trio the Punch" that appeared in the arcade in 1989 appeared as a mobile app. Tough Guy Santos, Ninja Kamakura-kun, Swordsman Rosesub ... Three main characters will save the world??

Easy-to-understand game content! Defeat a specific enemy on the stage and get a heart! When you collect all the hearts, the stage boss appears. It is an action game that clears the stage if you defeat the boss.

Strong ~ player! You can choose from three main characters: "Santos" the tough guy, "Kamakura-kun" the ninja, and "Rosesub" the swordsman.
All three of them are strong characters.

And a suspicious world view... Both the enemy and the boss are full of suspicious characters!!

If you defeat the boss's "sheep", there are a lot of strange and bizarre stage events such as "sheep curse" where you will be cursed and become a sheep in the next stage.

Also, for some reason, something called "Mr. Chin's Roulette Corner" appeared between the stages. If you get a hit and do well, your HP will increase and your attack will be powered up!
